name: Wire Brand
body:
### Welcome to the Wire Brand microsite.
This repository tracks **Wire** brand assets such as logos, press kit, styleguide, and writing guidelines such as our _Tone of Voice_.
The contents will be published via [GitHub Pages](https://pages.github.com) & [Jekyll](https://jekyllrb.com) to a subdomain at [wire.com](http://wire.com).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
